thread.title: TripAdvisor best places to visit in Europe
thread.title_full: TripAdvisor best places to visit in Europe - Business Insider

author: Chloe Pantazi
title: TripAdvisor best places to visit in Europe

organizations.name: features europe travel tripadvisor london paris rome arts & culture

text:
Paris is one of the best places you can go in Europe, according to TripAdvisor. Konstantin Yolshin/Shutterstock
The INSIDER Summary:
A new ranking from TripAdvisor reveals the best travel destinations in Europe for 2017. The list was compiled using an algorithm that sorted through millions of user reviews. London is rated the best place to go in Europe this year, followed by Paris, and Rome.
Europe is so full of amazing travel destinations that it can be hard to settle on where to actually go when you're planning a trip.
To help you narrow down that list, TripAdvisor has released a ranking of the top 25 destinations to visit on the continent .
The travel planning site used an algorithm to sort through millions of user reviews in the region to determine its findings.
From hip Eastern European cities to dreamy islands in the Mediterranean , here's the full ranking.
View As: One Page Slides 25. Moscow, Russia dimbar76/Shutterstock 24. Goreme, Turkey Volodymyr Goinyk 23. Malta Bareta/iStock 22. Dublin, Ireland massimofusaro/Shutterstock 21.
